Understate: The claim understates the existence of boycotts encouraged by the organizations mentioned.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is evidence of boycott activities related to the organizations mentioned.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that boycotts can only be organized by the umbrella labor group, ignoring the possibility of individual unions participating in boycotts.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that boycotts have been encouraged by member unions, even if not officially by the umbrella labor group.
